import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import Row from "react-bootstrap/row" import Container from "react-bootstrap/container" import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button" const FormPage = () => { const [fields, setFields] = useState([{ StudentID: 1, StudentFirstName: "", StudentLastName: "", StudentPhoto:"", StudentNote:"" }]) const handleChangeInput = (i, e) => { console.log(e.target.value); const values = [...fields] values[i][e.target.name] = e.target.value setFields(values) } const handleAdd = (StudentID) => { setFields([...fields, { StudentID: StudentID + 2, StudentFirstName: '', StudentLastName: '',StudentPhoto:'',StudentNote:'' }]) } const handleSubtract = (i) => { const values = [...fields] values.splice(i, 1) setFields([...values]) } return (
{fields.map((field, i) => (
First Name handleChangeInput(i, e)} /> Last Name handleChangeInput(i, e)} /> Optional Note handleChangeInput(i, e)} /> {/* */}
))}
{fields.map(field => <>
{field.StudentID}
{field.StudentFirstName}
{field.StudentLastName}
{field.StudentNote}
)} {stds?.map(std=> {std.StudentID} {std.StudentFirstName} {std.StudentLastName} {std.StudentPhoto} {std.StudentNote} )}
) } export default FormPage
